languages.text: "Смерть всегда держится рядом с астропатами и сурово карает за высокомерие и слабости. Я видел гибель своих товарищей, и иногда воспоминания тяготят меня сверх меры. К сожалению, почти в каждом хоре есть подобная история... и тот, кто выжил и продолжает нести своих призраков". {n}Он судорожно выдыхает.{/n} "Прошу простить, я не могу дальше бередить старые раны — для управления хором мне должно держать разум в чистоте и твердости".

traits.locale_text: "Смерть всегда держится рядом с астропатами и сурово карает за высокомерие и слабости. Я видел гибель своих товарищей, и иногда воспоминания тяготят меня сверх меры. К сожалению, почти в каждом хоре есть подобная история... и тот, кто выжил и продолжает нести своих призраков". {n}Он судорожно выдыхает.{/n} "Прошу простить, я не могу дальше бередить старые раны — для управления хором мне должно держать разум в чистоте и твердости".

languages.text: "Death always keeps close to Astropaths, and its punishments for arrogance and weaknesses are severe. I have seen my fellows die, and at times the memories are exceedingly hard to bear. Sadly, almost every Choir has a story like that... and a survivor who has carried their ghosts with them ever since." {n}Weisz lets out a ragged breath.{/n} "My apologies, but I cannot continue worrying at these old wounds. Directing a Choir requires a clear and firm state of mind."

К сожалению, почти в каждом хоре есть подобная история... и тот, кто выжил и продолжает нести своих призраков". {n}Он судорожно выдыхает.{/n} "Прошу простить, я не могу дальше бередить старые раны — для управления хором мне должно держать разум в чистоте и твердости".

Directing a Choir requires a clear and firm state of mind."

languages.text: «La muerte siempre está cerca de los Astrópatas, y castiga con dureza la arrogancia y la debilidad. He visto morir a mis compañeros, y, en ocasiones, esos recuerdos son extremadamente difíciles de soportar. No obstante, no hay Coro sin historias de tragedia... ni sin supervivientes que las llevan en la memoria». {n}Weisz deja escapar un suspiro entrecortado.{/n} «Lo siento, pero no puedo seguir lidiando con estas viejas heridas. Dirigir un Coro exige firmeza y claridad mental».
languages.original_text: "Death always keeps close to Astropaths, and its punishments for arrogance and weaknesses are severe. I have seen my fellows die, and at times the memories are exceedingly hard to bear. Sadly, almost every Choir has a story like that... and a survivor who has carried their ghosts with them ever since." {n}Weisz lets out a ragged breath.{/n} "My apologies, but I cannot continue worrying at these old wounds. Directing a Choir requires a clear and firm state of mind."

Dirigir un Coro exige firmeza y claridad mental».

languages.text: 「死は常に感応通信官に寄り添って、傲慢さと弱さには厳しい罰を与える。仲間の死を目の当たりにしてきましたが、その記憶は時に耐え難いものです。悲しいかな、この手の事はほぼすべての聖歌隊で聞く話なのです…生存者は、亡霊を背負うことになるのだ」{n}ワイズがひきつるような息を吐く。{/n}「申し訳ございません。しかし、古傷に悩まされ続けるわけにはまいりません。合唱団を指揮するには、明晰かつしっかりとした精神状態が必要です」
languages.original_text: "Death always keeps close to Astropaths, and its punishments for arrogance and weaknesses are severe. I have seen my fellows die, and at times the memories are exceedingly hard to bear. Sadly, almost every Choir has a story like that... and a survivor who has carried their ghosts with them ever since." {n}Weisz lets out a ragged breath.{/n} "My apologies, but I cannot continue worrying at these old wounds. Directing a Choir requires a clear and firm state of mind."

traits.locale_text: 「死は常に感応通信官に寄り添って、傲慢さと弱さには厳しい罰を与える。仲間の死を目の当たりにしてきましたが、その記憶は時に耐え難いものです。悲しいかな、この手の事はほぼすべての聖歌隊で聞く話なのです…生存者は、亡霊を背負うことになるのだ」{n}ワイズがひきつるような息を吐く。{/n}「申し訳ございません。しかし、古傷に悩まされ続けるわけにはまいりません。合唱団を指揮するには、明晰かつしっかりとした精神状態が必要です」

languages.text: “对星语者而言，死亡总是如影随形，它会毫不留情地惩罚那些傲慢、脆弱的人。我曾亲眼目睹过许多同伴死亡，有时候，那样的记忆简直要把我压垮了。可悲的是，几乎每个星语唱诗班都会发生这样的悲剧……只剩下那些背负了无数亡魂的幸存者。”{n}威茨疲惫地呼了口气。{/n}“我很抱歉，我不能继续沉浸在旧日的创伤之中了。身为星语者合唱团的指挥，我必须保持明澈而坚定的内心。”
languages.original_text: "Death always keeps close to Astropaths, and its punishments for arrogance and weaknesses are severe. I have seen my fellows die, and at times the memories are exceedingly hard to bear. Sadly, almost every Choir has a story like that... and a survivor who has carried their ghosts with them ever since." {n}Weisz lets out a ragged breath.{/n} "My apologies, but I cannot continue worrying at these old wounds. Directing a Choir requires a clear and firm state of mind."

languages.text: "Der Tod weicht den Astropathen nie von der Seite, und er bestraft Arroganz und Schwäche streng. Ich habe meine Kameraden sterben sehen, und manchmal sind die Erinnerungen daran kaum zu ertragen. Leider hat fast jeder Chor eine solche Geschichte ... und einen Überlebenden, der die Geister seiner Kameraden seitdem mit sich herumträgt." {n}Weisz atmet keuchend aus.{/n} "Verzeiht, aber ich kann nicht weiter an diesen alten Wunden herumkratzen. Um einen Chor zu führen, braucht man einen klaren und festen Verstand."
languages.original_text: "Death always keeps close to Astropaths, and its punishments for arrogance and weaknesses are severe. I have seen my fellows die, and at times the memories are exceedingly hard to bear. Sadly, almost every Choir has a story like that... and a survivor who has carried their ghosts with them ever since." {n}Weisz lets out a ragged breath.{/n} "My apologies, but I cannot continue worrying at these old wounds. Directing a Choir requires a clear and firm state of mind."

Leider hat fast jeder Chor eine solche Geschichte ... und einen Überlebenden, der die Geister seiner Kameraden seitdem mit sich herumträgt." {n}Weisz atmet keuchend aus.{/n} "Verzeiht, aber ich kann nicht weiter an diesen alten Wunden herumkratzen. Um einen Chor zu führen, braucht man einen klaren und festen Verstand."

languages.text: « La mort guette les astropathes en permanence, et elle punit sévèrement l'arrogance et la faiblesse. J'ai vu mes condisciples mourir, et parfois, ces souvenirs deviennent trop lourds à porter. Malheureusement, tous les chœurs ou presque ont une histoire similaire... et un survivant qui porte en lui la funeste mémoire de leurs fantômes. » {n}Weisz pousse un soupir harassé.{/n} « Je regrette, mais je ne peux pas continuer à me laisser ronger par mes anciennes blessures. La supervision d'un chœur nécessite un état d'esprit clair et solide. »
languages.original_text: "Death always keeps close to Astropaths, and its punishments for arrogance and weaknesses are severe. I have seen my fellows die, and at times the memories are exceedingly hard to bear. Sadly, almost every Choir has a story like that... and a survivor who has carried their ghosts with them ever since." {n}Weisz lets out a ragged breath.{/n} "My apologies, but I cannot continue worrying at these old wounds. Directing a Choir requires a clear and firm state of mind."

languages.text: "Ölüm, Astropatların her daim bir adım ötesindedir. Kibir ve zayıflığa karşı cezası ağır olur. Meslektaşlarımın yitip gidişini seyrettim ve bazen bu anılar, dayanamayacağım kadar ağır geliyor. Ne yazık ki hemen her Koro'da böyle hikâyeler vardır ve... Hayatta kalan birisi, ölenlerin hayaletlerini sonrasında hep yanında taşır." {n}Weisz, yorgun bir şekilde nefes veriyor.{/n} "Kusuruma bakmayın ama bu eski yaraları açmaya devam edemem. Bir Koro'yu yönetmek için kişinin hâletiruhiyesi sakin ve sağlam olmalıdır."
languages.original_text: "Death always keeps close to Astropaths, and its punishments for arrogance and weaknesses are severe. I have seen my fellows die, and at times the memories are exceedingly hard to bear. Sadly, almost every Choir has a story like that... and a survivor who has carried their ghosts with them ever since." {n}Weisz lets out a ragged breath.{/n} "My apologies, but I cannot continue worrying at these old wounds. Directing a Choir requires a clear and firm state of mind."
